name: Kaboom chan: the Curse of Halloween Devil
name_original: Kaboom chan: the Curse of Halloween Devil
description:
This is very short arcade game! But once of play is very intense, and it can't be cleared easily. The appearance is pretty, but toughness is desired!

Features

  • Funny and cute enemy design
  • Level is Auto-generated
  • 5endings
  • An attack hits continuously
  • 1lever 1button
  •  Cool sound

Hello! I'm a Japanese one man developer.

I'm not good at English at all. It'll be inconvenient, but please see generously!
